casebody.data:
Shawn T. JOHNSON, Plaintiff,
v.
Kelsey Irene HAYNES; Johnson Haynes Real Estate, Inc.; Stay Asheville; Private Dinner Chef; Burton Haynes, Inc.; Tifton Haynes individually and as Trustee or the successor in trust under the White Orchid Trust dated December 17, 2014, and any amendments thereto; The White Orchid Trust, Defendants. No. COA17-890 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: March 6, 2018

DISMISSED.
